content: Received my first dose of the #CovidVaccine #PfizerBioNTech today. I feel very privileged & lucky to have this to protect me & enable me to feel safer delivering care to patients @LPTnhs @BradgateUnit @LPTOTBradgate. Thank you to all involved in #LLR
date: 1:13 AM · Dec 15, 2020 from Leicester General Hospital·Twitter for Android
